documentation.summary: This document provides method-level documentation for the unit tests in the LINQ_Assignment project. The project consists of three test classes: - GetEvenTests: Validates filtering and skipping of even numbers. - GetOddTests: Ensures odd numbers are correctly filtered from a shuffled array. - GetArrayTests: Checks statistical calculations (average, min, max).

class.name: GetEvenTests
class.summary: Unit tests for verifying the correctness of the GetEvenNumbers method.

method.name: GetEven_ReturnEvenNumbers
method.summary: Validates that GetEvenNumbers correctly returns only even numbers from the array.

method.name: GetEven_SkipNumbers
method.summary: Tests that GetEvenNumbers correctly skips the specified number of even numbers.

class.name: GetOddTests
class.summary: Unit tests for verifying the correctness of the GetShuffledOddNumbers method.

method.name: GetOdd_ReturnOddNumbers
method.summary: Ensures that GetShuffledOddNumbers returns only odd numbers, even when shuffled.
